* 745 BCâThe Crown of Assyria seized by Pul, who takes the name Tiglath-

* 745 BCâLegendary death of Titus Tatius Roman King (Diarchy with con Romulus ).
* 743 BCâDuke Zhuang of the Chinese state of Zheng comes to power.

* 740 BCâTiglath-Pileser III conquers the city of Arpad in Syria after two

* 740 BCâStart of Ahaz's reign of Judah.
